name: Xclusive Organics - DropCare速 SRF Saccharomyces/Rice Ferment
description: Xclusive Organics offers DropCare速 SRF (Saccharomyces/Rice Ferment Filtrate), a premium skin health ingredient produced through rice fermentation with yeast, then meticulously filtered. This ingredient provides anti-aging and hydration support through beneficial compounds from Saccharomyces cerevisiae fermentation of rice.
notes: DropCare速 branded ingredient indicates quality control and consistency. Rice fermentation with Saccharomyces combines benefits of both rice extracts and yeast fermentation. Meticulously filtered for purity and stability.
